name: Destination: Earth
description:
Abandoned in space  with limitied supply of oxygen in his suit,

our hero swims through the dangers to his destination, good old Earth , his only hope for survival.

Will he succeed? Will he get there alive?

It is all up to you dear player!

So what are you waiting for? Download  the game and let’s get started!

Controls:

  • A,S,W,D or the arrow keys to control the astronaut
  • Mouse for menus

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 42 game jam (theme: "Running out of space")
